RelatedSentence: In a very emotional televised address , South Korean President Park Geun-hye apologized to the families of the victims of the recent ferry accident , saying she is ultimately responsible for the disaster .

Adding that the disaster leaves wounds that will be difficult to remove , Park wept as she read the names of the passengers and crew who suffered in the sinking ship because they stayed to help passengers get out .

RelatedSentence: Park also committed to disbanding the Korean Coast Guard for failing to fulfill their duties , which led to more than 300 people dead or missing .
